page.title: 072159 PENICUIK HOUSE POLICIES
page.content: TRANSPORT{via A766 which intersects {the A701(PENICUIK) & A702(WALSTONE). {Situated within 3km west of PENICUIK, {these POLICIES consist of 800 acres of {woodland and 200acres of grazing land. {5 driveways provide access to}PENICUIK HOUSE,{a unique residence at the heart {of the estate.7 lodges provide housing {facilities for estate workers,retired {people and individuals requiring short {-term rented accommodation. The woodland,{which is 75% hardwoods {and 25% softwoods is managed by The {Scottish Woodland Owners Group,who {employ,2 foresters.The grass pasture {is leesed to local tennant farmers. Horticultural activities{are the {concern of the gardener,who cares for {2 large walled gardens.}A gamekeeper {rears 200 grouse & 3000 pheasants in {an environment of trees,grassland and {ponds-}home of Sir John Clerk Bt.
